page.title: 04CHRISTCHURCH MONDAY MARKET
page.content: OUR MONDAY MARKET,WHICH WAS ESTABLISHED IN SAXON TIMES, IS HELD IN A CAR PARK AND IS QUITE GOOD VALUE FOR MONEY.IT SELLS CHINA, MATERIALS, DIY, CLOTHES AND VEGETABLES.PRICES IN THE MARKET DIFFER FROM THE PRICES IN THE SHOPS AS THE MARKET IS USUALLY CHEAPER. THE QUALITY OF THE GOODS IS AVERAGE. PRICES OF VEGETABLES (9/7/85) MARKET TOWN POTATOES 45p 5lb 60p 5lb CARROTS 20p 1lb 28p 1lb TOMATOES 45p 1lb 52p 1lb APPLES 60p 2lb 80p 2lb PEOPLE WHO WORK IN THE MARKET OFTEN GO TO OTHER MARKETS AROUND, SUCH AS HIGHCLIFFE, DORCHESTER, ALRESFORD, WINCHESTER AND POOLE. MOST OF THE STALL-HOLDERS SEEM TO ENJOY THEIR JOBS.
